name: SpaceBricks.WAV
description:
Originally a submission for Global Game Jam 2017 under the theme "waves".

A fast-paced arcade game where you try your best to set a high score. Navigate the play space while destroying bricks and avoiding asteroids. You only get five lives to complete your mission.

Challenge: Can you beat 227?

Sinjin -- Programming
Kevin -- Programming
Ray -- 3D Modelling / Environment Artist
Darby -- Graphic Design / Environment Artist
Bryna -- UI Manager
